revision.text:
====Examples==== Example 1: Catching a '''Shiny Dungeon Pokémon''' with a [[Repeatball]] yields: 3 * 5 = 15 EVs

Example 2: Catching a '''Shiny Roaming Pokémon''' yields: 5 * 50 = 250 EVs

Example 3: Catching a '''Shiny Roaming Pokémon''' with a [[Repeatball]] yields: 5 * 5 * 50 = 1250 EVs
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
